messages.subject: Re: Tsuka Wrapping
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Mark There is also two books and one old article  with some information about Tsuka-maki. And a video done in Washington state And I have some information
messages.messageBody:
Dear Mark

There is also two books and one old article with some information about
Tsuka-maki.

And a video done in Washington state

And I have some information on my web site and
I have a booklet that I sell

later
david

Mark

messages.subject: Tsuka Wrapping
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, Just wondering if anyone is aware of printed information on Tsuka Wrapping?  Or even internet information on how to do this.  Any help would be greatly
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,
Just wondering if anyone is aware of printed information on
Tsuka Wrapping? Or even internet information on how to do this. Any help
would be greatly appreciated.

Mark
